'''Lightning Bottler''' is a daily [[commission]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
#Collect all the Electro particles 0/1
#*Contrary to the instructions, not all particles need to be collected.

==Notes==
[[Sangonomiya Shrine]] variant
* Collect 12 (of 17) particles in 60 seconds

[[Shirikoro Peak]] variant
* Collect 15 (of 20) particles in 60 seconds
* Starts outside on the northern face of the mountain; spirals upwards counterclockwise to the peak.

[[Watatsumi Island]] variant
* Collect 10 (of 14) particles in 120 seconds
